caption.p: Effect of GMSYS on the weight of body (a), liver (b) and kidneys (c) in APAP-treated mice.

Data are presented as mean Â± SEM (n = 8). ## indicates a statistical significant difference at P < 0.01, when compared with the control group; * and ** indicates a statistical significant difference at P < 0.05 and P < 0.01, respectively, when compared with the APAP group.
